title: Couch Surf
desc: Designed the games section here and also created the game, Couch Blasters: Pandemic. I handled all of the Git merging and end product debugging.

title: Dev Fit (HTML)
desc: I worked primarily on the backend here, setting up the SQL database and APIs to handle the data transfer. Backend has testing for all the major functions necessary for parsing the final data object.

title: React Employee Directory
desc: I created a simple application for consuming API, and filtering for names through user input. React was used for the entirety of the application.

title: Dev Fit (React)
desc: Refactored this application in React, added authorization through Auth0, authored many of the react components, and intergrated a Mongo database for member classes and shop items.
